name: # Add your hullmods here. One left commented out for reference.
# Accelerated Shields
desc: Increases the turn rate of the ship's shields by %s and the rate at which the shields are raised by %s.
short: Increases shield turn rate and extension speed.
sModDesc: Increases the shield's turn rate and raise rate by an additional %s.

name: Storm Dampner
desc: As long as this ship has %s or higher CR, the fleet takes no damage when struck during a hyperspace storm and this ship loses combat readiness.

name: Pinnacle Mk 1
desc: The prototype model of the Pinnacle lacks the ablative drones, instead relying on a short-duration phase field to avoid strikes.
short: Removes the hangar mounts, phases the ship during system activation.

name: Electrical Phenomena
desc:
This ship is a wreck, animated by exotic electrical phenomena. Maximum speed is reduced by %s, maneuverability is reduced by %s, and it %s.

The ship has a %s lower sensor profile, requires %s and suffers %s. It reduces hull damage taken by %s, and its weapons and engines %s.

The ship gains electrical charge over time and when the sprites it creates are destroyed, and discharges when using ship systems. Charge grants an up to %s bonus to the recharge rate of weapons that use ammo, ship systems, and to armor rating for the purposes of damage reduction.
short: Surrounds the ship with exotic electrical phenomena.

name: # Civilian-grade Hull
desc: Increases sensor profile by %s. Reduces sensor strength by %s.
short: Increases sensor profile, reduces sensor strength.
